page.title:
Summer in Australia?
Summer in Australia?

Recent Review
Recent Review
page.normal_text:
APAC in the future must be regarded not just as the National Facility, but as the sum of its component parts comprising: […] The National Grid […]
APAC in the future must be regarded not just as the
National Facility, but as the sum of its component
parts comprising:
[…]
The National Grid
[…]

That the APAC National Grid must be the pre-eminent
That the APAC National Grid must be the pre-eminent

grid in Australia and continue extending its coverage to include capabilities wherever they exist or develop. It must also nurture and support scientific research teams, NCRIS infrastructure and international partnerships
grid in Australia and continue extending its coverage
to include capabilities wherever they exist or
develop. It must also nurture and support scientific
research teams, NCRIS infrastructure and
international partnerships
